reviews.text:
Great location, Borough Market, London Bridge, The Shard & Tower Bridge all very close by within 3 to 10 minute walk away.
Clean rooms with lovely, comfy beds and a good shower. Staff are friendly, welcoming, and helpful.
Great prices for centrally located London hotel.

As an American visiting London for the first time this was the perfect hotel. Affordable, fantastic location and the best staff of any hotel I have been to. I travel a lot and usually stay in higher end hotels but the staff at this location gave 5 star service at a more affordable price. The bed was very comfortable as well, would recommend.

A great place to stay for central London. The prices aren’t high, and it’s great value if you have children because you can get family rooms rather than two rooms like a lot of hotels.

The location is amazing. 5min walk from Tate Modern, Round the corner from The Globe, and next door to Borough Market. Loads of restaurants and bars along the Thames. The Southbank is about a 15min walk away.

Breakfast was the usual Premier Inn buffet. The room was a little small but didn’t seem too crowded. Very relaxed actually.

The staff were very friendly and helpful. If you arrive a bit early you can leave your bags. They even offered to store them for a while after we checked out.

All in all great value. I’d definitely stay here again if I needed somewhere central.

The Premier Plus room was surprisingly large and comfortable but very hot (and it wasn't above 20 outside). It didn't cool down for a few hours. The pillows were compressed to flat, hard cakes. The people were good and breakfast was amazing value - complete with vegan bacon and vegan sausages

A very nice location and good place to look around Bankside with Shakespeare's Globe, the Golden Hinde all close by.  Hotel well run, reception and staff very friendly.  Room functional for the visit.
